channel.title: Noobish question
channel.description:
Could somebody tell me , How i play on my testscape server? ive done evrything in that ''How to start ur own server tut'' but when i click on run server it just says starting server on port..43594
Then it stays like that .. could some1 help me?

item.title: Noobish question
item.dc:creator: @FlyingDutchman FlyingDutchman
item.description:
@FlyingDutchman wrote:

Thanks man!

Read full topic

item.title: Noobish question
item.dc:creator: @gungamma gungamma
item.description:
@gungamma wrote:

it is supposed to, then run mopar keep the ip the same, and log in with the name and password you want.

thats just if you want to log in

if you want others to, use no-ip.com

P.S. on moparscape go to file new port and put in your port(where it says starting testscape on 0.0.0:4345 or whatever urs is), just to make

sure itll work, if you have any simple errors, or want me to code you somthing(im really bored) i could,(im not that good but i can add some stuff

just not hard stuff)

Glad i Could help!

Read full topic
